name: Carved Wood
prompt: A VibeDeck controller carved entirely from rich dark walnut wood, like a luxury chess piece. The rotary knob is polished smooth wood with visible grain. Buttons are inlaid lighter maple wood with burned-in labels. The LCD screen is set into the wood like a jewel. Warm wood tones, craftsman aesthetic, visible wood grain throughout. Studio lighting on neutral background.
why: Shows premium craftsmanship, appeals to audiophile/luxury market
